title: Can the Amazon Echo Dot be used to play internet music without having my smartphone connected? - Quora

response.answer_text: Of course it can. Not sure why you thought you needed your phone in order to play music. There are many streaming services available on the Echo such as: TuneIn, iHeartRadio, Pandora, all free and the ones that require a subscription are: Spotify, Tidal, SiriusXM, Apple Music, Deezer and of course Amazon Music. Now if you are already a Amazon Prime subscriber you get music included so you don’t have to pay extra.
